title: Mushroom
content:
—Information accurate as of: 904.83 Update
The Mushroom is a food item that is commonly found on the ground, especially in beach areas and dirt patches in forests. They spawn over time, and can be picked off of the ground and eaten for small nutritional benefits. Mushrooms are usually in sparse clusters, so finding one is often an indication that more are nearby. Its use is similar to other Consumables.

sections.title: Obtaining
sections.content: The Mushroom can be obtained by picking it up anywhere in the world. Just move the cursor over the mushroom on the ground, and press "Use".

sections.title: Trivia
sections.content:
The name of the item is Mushroom; however when the player mouses over a mushroom in the world it will show as a Wild Mushroom.
Being easy to find, mushrooms are okay for nourishing players who do not have the resources to hunt.
